title: Halloween with Snowman Paul
description: Snowman Paul and his friends celebrate Halloween in a spooky tree house. Trick-or-treaters are in for exciting encounters with outer-space aliens, flying witches, dancing dragons and grouchy ghosts.!  Join Snowman Paul for a terrific Halloween adventure but remember: You've been warned!  Don't dare come near this tree house. Don't even risk a glance. But if you do, we're warning you: There is no second chance!
author: Yossi Lapid
